alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 1:39PM EDT until May 28 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Perdido River Near Barrineau Park affecting Baldwin and Escambia Counties. For the Perdido River...including Barrineau Park...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Perdido River Near Barrineau Park. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River begins to leave its banks at the parking lot of Adventures Perdido River. Begins to threaten several permanently parked travel trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 14.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
